=== Removed Yellow/Orange from Top Left ===

First of all, great work. I'm using (my edit of) the glossy version right now. The only change I made was to remove the yellow/orange from the top left corner. They were a bit distracting because the only other red/yellow/orange in the picture occur on ubuntu logos. Here are my results.

=== Guidelines ===

 1. Create the folder ''splashimages'' in ''/boot/grub''
    <code> sudo mkdir /boot/grub/splashimages </code>
 2. Copy ''.xpm.gz'' files into ''/boot/grub/splashimages''
 3. Edit your Grub ''menu.lst'' and add this line:
   for Human theme:
    <code> splashimage=(hd0,0)/grub/splashimages/HumanUbuntu.xpm.gz </code>
   or for Glossy theme:
    <code> splashimage=(hd0,0)/grub/splashimages/GlossyUbuntu.xpm.gz </code>

   '''NOTE''': Change the partition and directory according to your system's setup.
 4. Reboot your system to see the new grub splash image! ;)
